content: TITLE: Custom Headless Notivue Implementation with Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: A headless implementation of Notivue with a custom notification component styled using Tailwind CSS. Demonstrates how to create a fully custom notification UI while using Notivue's core functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Headless Notivue with Custom Components DESCRIPTION: Advanced example showing how to implement Notivue with a custom notification component, demonstrating the headless API capabilities with accessibility attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/packages/notivue/nuxt/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing Notivue in Vite Vue Application DESCRIPTION: Setup code for integrating Notivue in a Vue application using Vite. Imports necessary styles and creates a Notivue instance to be used with Vue's app.use() method. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` import { createApp } from 'vue' import { createNotivue } from 'notivue' import App from './App.vue' import 'notivue/notification.css' // Only needed if using built-in import 'notivue/animations.css' // Only needed if using default animations const notivue = createNotivue(/* Options */) const app = createApp(App) app.use(notivue) app.mount('#app') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Notivue in Nuxt Project DESCRIPTION: Configuration code for integrating Notivue in a Nuxt project. Shows how to add the Notivue module and required CSS in the Nuxt configuration file. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ modules: ['notivue/nuxt'], css: [ 'notivue/notification.css', // Only needed if using built-in 'notivue/animations.css' // Only needed if using default animations ], notivue: { // Options } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Notivue in Nuxt's app.vue DESCRIPTION: Basic implementation of Notivue in a Nuxt application's main app.vue file. Shows how to add a notification trigger button and the Notivue component with the default Notification component. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Notivue Implementation in App.vue DESCRIPTION: Basic implementation of Notivue in a Vue component. Includes a button to trigger notifications and the Notivue component with the default Notification component. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Notivue in Nuxt DESCRIPTION: Configuration example for Notivue in a Nuxt application. It shows how to add the module, import required CSS, and set up options in nuxt.config.ts. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/packages/notivue/nuxt/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ modules: ['notivue/nuxt'], css: [ 'notivue/notification.css', // Only needed if using built-in 'notivue/animations.css' // Only needed if using default animations ], notivue: { // Options } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Notivue Implementation in Vue DESCRIPTION: Simple implementation of Notivue in a Vue component showing how to push a notification and render it using the built-in Notification component. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/packages/notivue/nuxt/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Notivue Types in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Example of how to import Notivue TypeScript types manually when needed, as they are not auto-imported by the Nuxt module. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/packages/notivue/nuxt/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` import type { NotivueConfig, NotivueItem /*, ... */ } from 'notivue' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Notivue Package with Package Managers DESCRIPTION: Command line instructions for installing the Notivue package using different package managers including pnpm, npm, yarn, and bun. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` pnpm add notivue # npm i notivue # yarn add notivue # bun i notivue ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Notivue with Package Managers DESCRIPTION: Command line instructions for installing Notivue using different package managers including pnpm, npm, yarn, and bun. SOURCE: https://github.com/smastrom/notivue/blob/main/packages/notivue/nuxt/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` pnpm add notivue # npm i notivue # yarn add notivue # bun i notivue ```
